Description: Sandal for the left foot, made of leather, with rounded toe, one of a pair with 63216 remains of toe strap, ankle straps missing, now warped, cloth adhering.
Curator's comments: Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 311 fig. 12.8a
Original photograph AN404956001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
